title: 71. Is Good Corporate Citizenship Also Good for the Bottom Line?
description: A new study says that yes, it is -- but try telling that to the United Nations officials who are preaching sustainability practices.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: A new study says that yes, it is -- but try telling that to the United Nations officials who are preaching sustainability practices.
